caption:
✨MAGIC✨ @altrarunning and @publiclandsshop brought some trail magic to the Pacific Crest Trail near Medford, Oregon.  
 
Hikers enjoyed a refreshing break with fresh meals, cold drinks, and a shady retreat from the summer heat. This elevated trailside support station also featured a chance to meet the inspiring thru-hike legend @BrianaDeSanctis.  
 
The event celebrated the goodwill of trail angels and brought joy to those trekking across the PCT.  
 
#StayOutThere
